videos.description: Blake Griffin finds Kevin Durant open for the quick 3-pointer to beat the shot clock.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD beats the shot clock with a 3-pointer) 2021/11/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD beats the shot clock with a 3-pointer

videos.description: Scottie Barnes steals the ball from Kevin Durant and races coast-to-coast for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Scottie Barnes picks KD's pocket for jam) 2021/11/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Scottie Barnes picks KD's pocket for jam

videos.description: James Harden and Kevin Durant display their connection for a thunderous throwdown.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden and KD execute perfect give-and-go for big slam) 2021/11/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden and KD execute perfect give-and-go for big slam

videos.description: DeAndre' Bembry flies through the lane for the two-handed jam.

videos.headline: Bembry attacks the rack for two-handed flush

videos.description: Kevin Durant is fired up after powering through contact for the tough shot.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD gets hyped after tough and-1 falls) 2021/11/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD gets hyped after tough and-1 falls

videos.description: Pascal Siakam absorbs contact from Blake Griffin and gets the shot to fall.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Siakam can't help but smile after and-1 over Griffin) 2021/11/07 ESHEET

videos.headline: Siakam can't help but smile after and-1 over Griffin
